title: Genesis Chapter 41 Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of Genesis chapter 41 with 16 questions covering key people, places, events, and teachings from this chapter.

questions.question: According to Genesis 41:10, who was wroth with his servants?
questions.explanation: Genesis 41:10 states: "Pharaoh was wroth with his servants, and put me in ward in the captain of the guard's house, both me and the chief ba..."

questions.question: According to Genesis 41:14, who sent and called Joseph?

questions.question: Who said "It is not in me: God shall give Pharaoh an answer of peace" in Genesis 41:16?
questions.explanation: Genesis 41:16 states: "And Joseph answered Pharaoh, saying, It is not in me: God shall give Pharaoh an answer of peace."

questions.question: According to Genesis 41:25, who said unto Pharaoh?
questions.explanation: Genesis 41:25 states: "And Joseph said unto Pharaoh, The dream of Pharaoh is one: God hath shewed Pharaoh what he is about to do."

questions.question: Who said "unto Pharaoh, The dream of Pharaoh is one: God hath shewed Pharaoh what he is..." in Genesis 41:25?

questions.question: In Genesis 41:1, Joseph came to pass at the end of two full years.
questions.explanation: This is false. It was Pharaoh, not Joseph, who came to pass at the end of two full years. Genesis 41:1 states: "And it came to pass at the end of two full years, that Pharaoh dreamed: and, behold, he stood by ..."

questions.question: In Genesis 41:45, Joseph went out over all the land of Egypt.
questions.explanation: This is correct. Genesis 41:45 states: "And Pharaoh called Joseph's name Zaphnathpaaneah; and he gave him to wife Asenath the daughter of..."

questions.question: In Genesis 41:46, Joseph went out from the presence of Pharaoh.
questions.explanation: This is correct. Genesis 41:46 states: "And Joseph was thirty years old when he stood before Pharaoh king of Egypt. And Joseph went out f..."

questions.question: Complete this verse from Genesis 41:2: "And, ______, there came up out of the river seven well favoured kine and fatfleshed ; and they fed in a meadow."
questions.explanation: The complete verse reads: "And, behold, there came up out of the river seven well favoured kine and fatfleshed ; and they fed in a meadow."
